column2: This will request money from other players in the game. Please do not spam click or otherwise exploit this decision and it's event chain.
This will prohibit other players from giving us aid. It can be reversed at any time.
This will allow us to give foreign aid to other players. It must be activated before a player chooses to request it. It can be reversed at any time.
This will prevent us from getting events when other players request foreign aid. It can be reversed at any time.
